p: As shown in Fig. 1, crop-climate ensembles involve both a prior modelling framework ( Section 2) and the running of crop models (introduced in Section 3). We focus here on the overarching issues and approaches associated with forming a crop-climate ensemble, including choice of crop and climate models ( Section 4.1), decisions on when and how to assess skill ( Section 4.2), and dealing with any scale-dependency of model choice and ensemble member selection ( Section 4.3). The supplementary information presents more detail on these issues, as well as the full list of our criteria for application of crop modelling to impacts, adaptation and risk assessment.
